body:
I give permission to license my ECIPs under the  Apache 2.0 license.

On a side note, after doing research, I do believe the Apache license is
the best open source license available for large multi-repo, many
stakeholder, software ecosystems (Apache, Cassandra, Kafka, Hadoop,Spark,
etc.)

- Alexander Tsankov

On Tue, Nov 5, 2019 at 13:49 cseberino <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I give permission to license my ECIPs under the Apache 2.0 license.
>
> Chris Seberino
> _______________________________________

> Christian Seberino, Ph.D.

> On Tue, Nov 5, 2019 at 12:33 PM Wei Tang <notifications@github.com> wrote:
>
> > @bobsummerwill <https://github.com/bobsummerwill> Just a note -- if the
> > author prefers public domain and has licensed her or his specs in public
> > domain, then there's no need to ask permission to relicense it under
> > Apache-2. Whether we want to intentionally do this is another topic.
> >
> > —
